name: Andrew Cutts
label: GIS, Earth observation and Python Consultant
summary: I am a Geospatial / Earth Observation (EO) specialist with two decades of working experience. I have a range of industry experience from large multinational companies, SME/Startups and working for myself as a freelancer.

highlights: Geospatial Services offered including consulting, writing and training
I am a JNCC Business Associate
Authored Learn QGIS 3.4 (Forth Edition), I regularly give training courses on Geospatial Python

Recent work highlights: QA/QC Python Scripts for Analysis Ready Data, Landcover modelling, Object detection in satellite imagery, consulting on various environmental projects examples from Peatland, Salt Marsh and Grassland
Project Management guided by Agile
Rapid prototyping and automation with Python
Scaling EO processes into the cloud
Building proof of concept EO products and working on bids
GIS and EO Consultanting
Working as a consultant offering GIS and EO services.
Partnered with EPI Group Ltd to develop a GIS business line.

work_experience.summary: GIS and Remote Sensing related activities
highlights: GIS and Remote Sensing lead representing the company at worldwide conferences and recruitment events
Working with key stakeholders to ensure that geospatial products/processes accurately reflected business requirements
Modelling operational productivity tools, seeking out all commercial solutions and weighing up against in house design
Sourcing and processing EO datasets to support operations
Terrain modelling and creating EO derived products

work_experience.summary: GIS and Remote Sensing related activities
highlights: GIS and Remote Sensing development (desktop and web) and worldwide support this involved setting up a worldwide GIS database and creating GIS web services with ArcGIS for server
